definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Participant(s) who fail to produce valid identity documents will not be permitted to participate in the race.
sentences.chinese: 未能出示有效身份證明文件的參賽者，不得出賽。

sentences.english: Participants must not discuss the problems with others before the deadline for solution submission.
sentences.chinese: 參賽者在截止日期之前不能和其他人討論賽題。

sentences.english: The Contestant must be a resident of the District of Greater Vancouver.
sentences.chinese: 參賽者必須於大溫地區居住。

sentences.english: Contestants mesmerised by their own singing.
sentences.chinese: 參賽者陶醉在自己的歌聲中。

sentences.english: The Unemployment Olympians are laughing, but they are not okay.
sentences.chinese: 這些失業的參賽者們在笑，但他們並不真正的開心。

sentences.english: The Referee and Judges of a kumite bout must not have the nationality of either of the participants.
sentences.chinese: 對打回合賽的主審和副審或與參賽者不可有相同國籍。

sentences.english: That is still a deduction, as it is still partly the fault of the competitor.
sentences.chinese: 由於這是參賽者的錯誤導至所以要減分。

sentences.english: The number of the competitors at last narrowed down to only less than 100.
sentences.chinese: 參賽者的數量竟然縮減到不足100人。

sentences.english: The competitors march around the stadium and then form up in the center of the ground facing the tribune.
sentences.chinese: 參賽者繞場一週，然後在場地中央面對主席臺列隊。

sentences.english: In this nomination must be used classical belly dance costume.
sentences.chinese: 參賽者必須穿着正式的演出服。

sentences.english: There is no guarantee that those who have been selected and groomed will be confirmed as an artiste.
sentences.chinese: 學校將不保證參賽者在接受培訓後會成爲藝人。

sentences.english: In the game of croquet uses a wooden hammer to whack wooden balls through little hoops.
sentences.chinese: 在槌球比賽中，參賽者用木槌擊球穿過小門。

sentences.english: Roll-call on time at each call room and starting area.
sentences.chinese: 參賽者必須準時到各項目檢錄地點進行檢錄。

sentences.english: The racers were dithering when the race started.
sentences.chinese: 當競賽開始時，參賽者緊張不安。

sentences.english: Participants shall only wear rubber-soled sports shoes or running shoes with spikes not more than 6 mm long for the competition.
sentences.chinese: 參賽者只能穿着膠鞋或釘長不超過6毫米的釘鞋比賽。

sentences.english: Yachtsmen vying for the America's Cup practiced their maneuvers in dead earnest.
sentences.chinese: “美國杯”遊艇參賽者非常認真進行演習。

definition: to compete/to take part in a competition
student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
to be present/to be on the scene
